entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18 except minus 13 south of Hare Bay.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 in the Canada Bay area early this evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Low minus 18 except minus 13 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming north 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023
